backend/main.mo: Defines core backend actor types for books, journaling, meditation sessions, user profiles, rituals, and import/export data, plus initializes a static book list.
feature_evidence.json: Contains feature evidence entries mapping feature requirements to affected files, components, and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Lists summarized descriptions of various frontend files for reference or tooling.
frontend/DEPLOYMENT_RUNBOOK.md: Provides step-by-step instructions for redeploying the frontend without code changes.
frontend/DEPLOYMENT_TROUBLESHOOTING.md: Provides a structured template for diagnosing and resolving deployment failures.
frontend/index.css: Defines global Tailwind base styles and color variables for light and dark themes.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point setting up root div, favicon, error handlers, and loading the main React module.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React app component configuring routes, theme provider, error boundary, and global toaster styling.
frontend/src/components/AmbientMusicCaro: Carousel for selecting ambient audio tracks with swipe, mute, and volume controls; manages audio playback via an internal Audio element.
frontend/src/components/AppErrorBoundary: React error boundary that displays detailed error info and offers a reload option when the app crashes.
frontend/src/components/CloudSyncErrorBa: Destructive alert banner for sync or load errors with a retry button and loading state.
frontend/src/components/ExportImportCont: Floating buttons for exporting data to JSON and importing from a file, with loading indicators.
frontend/src/components/FeatureCard.tsx: Empty placeholder file with no implementation.
frontend/src/components/FloatingNav.tsx: Floating vertical navigation menu with animated icons and hover labels that routes to main app sections.
frontend/src/components/HamburgerMenu.ts: Mobile slide-out menu providing theme toggle, account actions, and navigation, integrated with Internet Identity.
frontend/src/components/KnowledgeBookPag: Paged reader component with swipe, keyboard navigation, and auto-scroll to show sequential knowledge pages.
frontend/src/components/KnowledgeCategor: Carousel for selecting knowledge categories with swipe, keyboard, and circular navigation plus dynamic card styling.
frontend/src/components/KnowledgeQuizDia: Modal quiz dialog that shuffles questions, tracks answers, navigates between them, and shows final results.
frontend/src/components/lotus-r3f/LotusM: R3F lotus mesh rendering dynamic petals, glow, and breathing animations based on growth state.
frontend/src/components/lotus-r3f/LotusP: Particle system around lotus with chaotic or coherent motion driven by growth parameters.
frontend/src/components/LotusCanvas.tsx: Canvas-based animated lotus and particles with theme- and variant-based visual adjustments and pulsing effects.
frontend/src/components/MeditationCarous: Circular carousel of meditation types with swipe navigation and dynamic scaling for centered and adjacent cards.
frontend/src/components/MeditationGuideS: Step-by-step meditation guide with swipe navigation, animated transitions, and parsed content including benefits.
frontend/src/components/MeditationTimerR: Canvas-based circular meditation timer with animated wave fill, glow effects, and theme‑aware colors.
frontend/src/components/MeditationTimerW: Canvas component rendering a vertical wave-filled progress bar behind centered time text.
frontend/src/components/MobileBackButton: Mobile-only button that navigates back to the dashboard using a styled icon button.
frontend/src/components/PageBackgroundSh: Layout wrapper applying a themed background and rendering an animated LotusCanvas behind children.
frontend/src/components/ProgressBowl.tsx: Canvas-rendered bowl graphic showing total meditation minutes as animated liquid fill with glow effects.
frontend/src/components/ProgressLotusR3F: 3D lotus growth visualization using react-three-fiber with lights, particles, and auto-rotating controls.
frontend/src/components/ProgressLotusSVG: Animated multi-layer SVG lotus that changes color, glow, and petal openness based on meditation progress and streak.
frontend/src/components/QuizDialog.tsx: Modal quiz presenting five questions and computing a recommended meditation type from selected answers.
frontend/src/components/RitualSelectionM: Modal listing up to five saved rituals with a carousel interface and start/delete actions.
frontend/src/components/SavedRitualsCaro: Carousel for browsing, starting, and deleting saved rituals with swipe and dialog support.
frontend/src/components/SessionIndicator: Displays login state and provides guest return or logout actions, clearing related queries.
Page navigation bar with optional back button, theme toggle, session indicator, and mobile menu.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Hook that creates and manages a backend actor tied to identity changes and invalidates dependent queries.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Context and hooks for managing Internet Identity login, logout, and identity persistence.
frontend/src/hooks/useMeditationTimer.ts: Implements a countdown meditation timer with pause, seek, progress, and completion callback support.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Provides React Query hooks for meditation data, including types, quotes, and local/guest fallbacks.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind setup, theme variables, and custom animations for the app's styling.
frontend/src/lib/bookData.ts: Exports a list of recommended meditation-related books with descriptions, tags, and Amazon links.
frontend/src/lib/knowledgeContent.ts: Contains structured educational content and quizzes for meditation techniques.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with query client and Internet Identity provider.
frontend/src/pages/BookRecommendationsPa: Renders a swipeable, theme-aware carousel UI for browsing book recommendations.
frontend/src/pages/DashboardPage.tsx: Main dashboard showing quotes, meditation types, rituals, and navigation to sessions, quiz, and pre‑meditation flow.
frontend/src/pages/JournalPage.tsx: Displays and manages journal entries with filtering, editing, favoriting, deletion, import/export, and guest‑mode recovery.
frontend/src/pages/KnowledgePage.tsx: Shows meditation knowledge content with category navigation, scrolling, quizzes, and theme/session controls.
frontend/src/pages/LandingPage.tsx: Landing screen handling login, guest mode, theme toggle, and redirecting authenticated users to the dashboard.
frontend/src/pages/PreMeditationPage.tsx: Handles meditation setup, timer, ambient sound selection, guides, reflections, and ritual saving/deletion before and after a session.
frontend/src/pages/ProgressPage.tsx: Renders the progress dashboard, showing meditation stats, streaks, rank info, session history, and import/export controls with error handling.
frontend/src/utils/cloudSync.ts: Provides standardized cloud sync error mapping and readiness checks for backend operations.
frontend/src/utils/exportImport.ts: Handles serialization and deserialization of meditation data to a safe JSON format for export/import with validation.
Manages saving and retrieving quiz scores in localStorage, supporting both guest and authenticated users.
frontend/src/utils/lotusGrowthModel.ts: Computes lotus growth visualization parameters based on total meditation minutes using phased thresholds and smooth transitions.
frontend/src/utils/meditationStorage.ts: Implements localStorage-based persistence for guest journal entries, progress stats, and rituals with validation and update helpers.
frontend/src/utils/progressRanks.ts: Defines rank tiers based on total meditation minutes and provides helpers to get current/next rank and minutes needed to advance.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Provides helpers to read URL or hash parameters, persist them in sessionStorage, and clear them from storage or the hash.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with custom colors, themes, container settings, shadows, and plugins for typography, container queries, and animations.
project_state.json: Holds project metadata including feature requirements, known issues, architectural notes, and the current project state version.
